# Check

- [ ] Browser verification (minimum) Android Chrome/iOS Safari(375px-)
- [ ] CSS not affected by inheritance
- [ ] Layout does not break even if there is an overflow
- [ ] Layout does not break when wraps
- [ ] Added new Component
